form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Screened by NARA A/24/2023 14410 FORM APPROVED, IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE BUDGET BUREAU NO. 43-R0368 APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF FES STAMP LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE 7 18 PM "IV OF AN ALIEN Take or mail to- IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, I request that the American Consul at Visa Unit American Embassy, Mexico, D. F. be furnished a verification of my lawful admission into the United States for permanent residence to be used in connection with the person(s) listed under item 15. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS: Vda de RIOS MARIA TRUJILLO A-30-383-803 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 4. MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) (Year) 151 1/2 N" St. Colton, California 92324 4 22 1900 5. FATHER'S NAME: 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS: (City) (Country) Concepcion Trujillo San Diego de Alejandria, Jal. Mex 7. MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME: 8. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) Lucia Lopez U.S.A. INFORMATION IN THESE BLOCKS PERTAINS TO MY LAST ARRIVAL INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE 9. NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE: (Last) (First) (Middle) 10. PORT OF ARRIVAL: Vda de RIOS MARIA TRUJILLO AKA! San Ysidro, California 11. DATE OF ARRIVAL: (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. MEANS OF ARRIVAL: (Name of Vessel, or Airline and Flight No., etc.) 10 3 1970 BUS 13. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSON IN THE U.S. TO WHOM I WAS DESTINED: 14. AT THE TIME OF LAST LAWFUL ADMISSION TO THE U.S. I ENTERED WITH Juan Jose T. Rios AN IMMIGRANT VISA AN ALIEN REGISTRATION RECEIPT CARD 151 1/2 E N St. A PERMIT TO REENTER OTHER (EXPLAIN) Colton, California 92324 AND I HAVE NOT BEEN ABSENT FROM THE UNITED STATES SINCE. 15. THE PERSONS IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH MARIA RIOS TRUJILLO 2-1-38 Purisima del Rincon, Gto. RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS daughter Calle MORELOS #62 Purisivia - De-BUSTOS-ETD - FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH (Mexico) RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 16. FULL SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT AS NOW USED The Secretary of State is hereby respectfully informed that the subject named above was was not lawfully admitted for permanent residence as shown. Visa gister CiTy 8-19-70 at Insert symbol for entries after 6/30/24, LAWFUL INS Office: his Date: 11/01/74 Verifier: Contact Representative USINS FORM I-550 (REV. 6-1-69)
